mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_minisite_user_action_record (uuid, type, miniUrl, datetime) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{type}, #{miniUrl}, sysdate());
INSERT INTO cms_minisite_user_action_phone_rela (uuid, phone, datetime) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{phone}, sysdate() );

INSERT INTO cms_minisite_user_action_v2 (cityId, USERID, IDTYPE, platform, broswer, ip, action, miniUri, UUID, info, Datetime) VALUES ( #{cityId}, #{userid}, #{idtype}, #{platform}, #{broswer}, #{ip}, #{action}, #{miniUri}, #{uuid}, #{info}, sysdate());

INSERT INTO cms_minisite_user_action_v3 (IDTYPE, platform, broswer, ip, action, UUID, info, Datetime, channel) VALUES (#{idtype}, #{platform}, #{broswer}, #{ip}, #{action}, #{uuid}, #{info}, sysdate(), #{channel});
mapper.select:
SELECT tb2.ch as channel,tb2.click as click, tb1.donwload as download from (SELECT channel ch, count(DISTINCT uuid) donwload FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v3 WHERE ACTION = 'download'
and to_days(datetime) = to_days(now())
and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) <= 1 and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) > 0
and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) < date(datetime)
GROUP BY channel) tb1 right join (SELECT channel ch, count(DISTINCT uuid) click FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v3 WHERE 1=1
and to_days(datetime) = to_days(now())
and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) <= 1 and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) > 0
and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) < date(datetime)
GROUP BY channel) tb2 on tb2.ch = tb1.ch;

SELECT tb2.ch as channel,tb2.click as click, tb1.donwload as download from (SELECT idtype ch, count(DISTINCT uuid) donwload FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2 WHERE (action = 'share-downloadApp-click' OR action = 'downloadApp')
and to_days(datetime) = to_days(now())
and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) <= 1 and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) > 0
and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) < date(datetime)
GROUP BY idtype) tb1 right join (SELECT idtype ch, count(DISTINCT uuid) click FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2
WHERE idtype >= 1001 and idtype <=1008
and to_days(datetime) = to_days(now())
and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) <= 1 and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) > 0
and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) < date(datetime)
GROUP BY idtype) tb2 on tb2.ch = tb1.ch;
select count(*) from cms_minisite_user_action_v2 where idtype in (${idtypes}) and action = #{action};

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%T') '截至时间', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cityId,userid FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2 WHERE idtype = 10 )t) '短信连接点击人数', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cityId,userid FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2 WHERE ACTION = 'btnclick-download-android' AND idtype = 10 )t) '点击下载安卓客户端人数', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cityId,userid FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2 WHERE ACTION = 'btnclick-download-ios' AND idtype = 10 )t) '点击下载iPhone客户端人数', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT UUID FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2 WHERE idtype = 11 AND cityId = 'gz' )t) '广州用户点开数', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT UUID FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2 WHERE idtype = 11 AND cityId <> 'gz' )t) '非广州用户点开数', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT UUID FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2 WHERE ACTION LIKE 'page-enter-bst-result-mc%' AND idtype = 11 )t) '通过输入考号获取结果人数', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT UUID FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2 WHERE ACTION LIKE 'page-enter-bst-result-nomc%' AND idtype = 11 )t) '通过输入成绩获取结果人数', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT UUID FROM cms_minisite_user_action_v2 WHERE ACTION = 'alinkclick-yimo' AND idtype = 11 )t) '点击WAP页中一模网址人数' FROM DUAL

SELECT t2.idtype,t2.click,t1.download,t2.`datetime` from (SELECT idtype, count(DISTINCT uuid) download,date(`datetime`) `datetime` from (select * from cms_minisite_user_action_v3 where 1=1
and to_days(datetime) = to_days(now())
and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) <= 1 and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) > 0
and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) < date(datetime)
and `action`='download'
and (`idtype`>=1 and `idtype`<=999)) b
group by `idtype`,date(`datetime`)) t1 right join (SELECT idtype, count(DISTINCT uuid) click,date(`datetime`) `datetime` from (select * from cms_minisite_user_action_v3 where 1=1
and to_days(datetime) = to_days(now())
and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) <= 1 and to_days(now()) - to_days(datetime) > 0
and date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) < date(datetime)
and (`idtype`>=1 and `idtype`<=999)) b
group by `idtype`,date(`datetime`)) t2 on t2.idtype = t1.idtype and t2.datetime = t1.datetime

select substring_index(substring_index(t.info, '|', 1), '|', - 1) as name, substring_index(substring_index(t.info, '|', 2), '|', - 1) as phone, substring_index(substring_index(t.info, '|', 3), '|', - 1) as address, substring_index(substring_index(t.info, '|', 4), '|', - 1) as nickName, substring_index(substring_index(t.info, '|', 5), '|', - 1) as uId, t.`datetime` as datetime from (SELECT * FROM `cms_minisite_user_action_v2` where idtype = #{idtype} and action = 'btnclick-savename' ) t ORDER BY t.`datetime` DESC;

SELECT 1=1 as datetime,
(SELECT count(distinct uuid) FROM( SELECT * FROM `cms_minisite_user_action_v3` WHERE info is not null AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(info,"|",1) = "CPJVIkBVxFxV1VhNk9kNU" AND idtype = 'SMS-sx-wuyou') t) as openCount,

FROM DUAL
